content.text: Create a public transportation app with real-time tracking

I will construct a comprehensive, multi-page public transportation application called 'TransitFlow'. This project will simulate real-time vehicle tracking on an interactive map, a core feature requested by the user. The application will be built using only vanilla HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, with Tailwind CSS, Font Awesome, and the Leaflet.js library for mapping, all included via CDN. The architecture will be modular and professional, featuring separate pages for the Home/Dashboard, a real-time Map, a list of Routes, and a Contact page. To simulate the real-time functionality, I will create a mock data service in a `data.js` file, which will provide route paths and vehicle information. The `map.js` script will then use this data to initialize a Leaflet map, draw route lines, and animate vehicle markers along their paths using `setInterval` to create a convincing real-time tracking effect. The UI will be modern, responsive, and aesthetically pleasing, with a consistent color scheme, professional navigation, and a polished footer, aiming for a premium user experience that goes beyond a simple demo.

The architecture will be modular and professional, featuring separate pages for the Home/Dashboard, a real-time Map, a list of Routes, and a Contact page. To simulate the real-time functionality, I will create a mock data service in a `data.js` file, which will provide route paths and vehicle information. The `map.js` script will then use this data to initialize a Leaflet map, draw route lines, and animate vehicle markers along their paths using `setInterval` to create a convincing real-time tracking effect. The UI will be modern, responsive, and aesthetically pleasing, with a consistent color scheme, professional navigation, and a polished footer, aiming for a premium user experience that goes beyond a simple demo.
object.description: A modern, multi-page public transportation application featuring a simulated real-time vehicle tracking map, route browser, and a clean, responsive user interface.
object.title: Real-Time Transit App

Navigate Your City with Confidence

Real-time tracking, accurate schedules, and service alerts. Your journey, simplified.
